newsitem.title: JAPAN: Nippon Shinpan forgives loans to units, posts loss.
newsitem.headline: Nippon Shinpan forgives loans to units, posts loss.

text.p: Japanese credit card company Nippon Shinpan Co Ltd said on Friday it posted losses totaling 5.28 billion yen in the year ended on March 31 as a result of forgiving loans to its subsidiaries.
The company also said in a statement that it earmarked 1.54 billion yen as loan loss reserves.
The statement said, however, that the company would not change its business forecast for 1996/97 as a result of the moves.
The company also posted an appraisal loss of 7.99 billion yen from its securites holdings in 1996/97.
